# Righteous Glare (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]], [[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 105

You gain a supernatural gaze attack like that of a ghaele eladrin. Evil creatures with 5 HD or fewer within 60 feet of you must make a successful Will save or die. Even if the save succeeds, the creature is affected as though by a *[[Fear (Spell)|fear]]* spell for 2d10 rounds. Neutral (neither good nor evil) creatures, and evil creatures with more than 5 HD, must succeed on a Will save or suffer the fear effect.
